subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Baseball encyclopedias listed Phil Rizzuto’s birth date as Sept. 25, 1917, because that’s when Rizzuto reported he was born. But that wasn’t necessarily so. Or was it?
snippet: Baseball encyclopedias listed Phil Rizzuto’s birth date as Sept. 25, 1917, because that’s when Rizzuto reported he was born. But that wasn’t necessarily so. Or was it?
